commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{% assign section_id = section.settings.custom_id | default: 'shopify-section-' | append: section.id %}
{% if section.settings.heading != blank %} <{{ section.settings.heading_tag }} class="title" style="color: {{ section.settings.heading_color }}; text-align: {{ section.settings.heading_align }}; font-weight: {{ section.settings.heading_weight }}"> {{ section.settings.heading | escape }} {% endif %} {% if section.settings.text != blank %}
{{ section.settings.text }}
{% endif %} {% if section.settings.button_label != blank %} {% if section.settings.button_icon != blank and section.settings.button_icon_position == 'left' %} {{ section.settings.button_icon }} {% endif %} {{ section.settings.button_label }} {% if section.settings.button_icon != blank and section.settings.button_icon_position == 'right' %} {{ section.settings.button_icon }} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{% for block in section.blocks %}
{% if block.settings.media_type == 'image' %} {% elsif block.settings.media_type == 'video' %} {% if block.settings.video_url contains 'youtube.com' or block.settings.video_url contains 'vimeo.com' %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{% endfor %}
{ "name": "Image Grid", "settings": [ { "type": "select", "id": "section_width", "label": "Section Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "section_content_width", "label": "Content Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "custom_id", "label": "Custom ID" }, { "type": "text", "id": "custom_class", "label": "Custom CSS Class" }, { "type": "color", "id": "background_color", "label": "Background Color" }, { "type": "image_picker", "id": "background_image", "label": "Background Image" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_desktop", "label": "Hide on Desktop" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_tablet", "label": "Hide on Tablet" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_mobile", "label": "Hide on Mobile" }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_top", "label": "Padding Top", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_bottom", "label": "Padding Bottom", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_left", "label": "Padding Left", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_right", "label": "Padding Right", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_top", "label": "Margin Top", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_bottom", "label": "Margin Bottom", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_left", "label": "Margin Left", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_right", "label": "Margin Right", "default": 0 }, { "type": "text", "id": "heading", "label": "Heading" }, { "type": "select", "id": "heading_tag", "label": "Heading Tag", "default": "h2", "options": [ { "value": "h1", "label": "H1" }, { "value": "h2", "label": "H2" }, { "value": "h3", "label": "H3" }, { "value": "h4", "label": "H4" }, { "value": "h5", "label": "H5" }, { "value": "h6", "label": "H6" } ] }, { "type": "color", "id": "heading_color", "label": "Heading Color" }, { "type": "select", "id": "heading_align", "label": "Heading Alignment", "default": "center", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "center", "label": "Center" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "heading_weight", "label": "Heading Font Weight", "default": "700", "options": [ { "value": "400", "label": "Normal" }, { "value": "700", "label": "Bold" } ] }, { "type": "richtext", "id": "text", "label": "Description" }, { "type": "color", "id": "text_color", "label": "Text Color" }, { "type": "select", "id": "text_align", "label": "Text Alignment", "default": "center", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "center", "label": "Center" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "text_italic", "label": "Italic Text" }, { "type": "text", "id": "button_label", "label": "Button Label" }, { "type": "url", "id": "button_link", "label": "Button Link" }, { "type": "select", "id": "button_style", "label": "Button Style", "default": "primary", "options": [ { "value": "primary", "label": "Primary" }, { "value": "secondary", "label": "Secondary" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "button_icon", "label": "Button Icon (SVG or Text)" }, { "type": "select", "id": "button_icon_position", "label": "Button Icon Position", "default": "right", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "enable_slider", "label": "Enable Slider" }, { "type": "number", "id": "section_height_desktop", "label": "Section Height (Desktop)", "default": 500 } ], "blocks": [ { "type": "media_item", "name": "Media Item", "settings": [ { "type": "select", "id": "media_type", "label": "Media Type", "options": [ { "value": "image", "label": "Image" }, { "value": "video", "label": "Video" } ], "default": "image" }, { "type": "image_picker", "id": "image", "label": "Image" }, { "type": "range", "id": "image_width", "label": "Image Width (%)", "min": 10, "max": 100, "default": 100 }, { "type": "select", "id": "image_ratio", "label": "Image Ratio", "options": [ { "value": "1/1", "label": "Square" }, { "value": "16/9", "label": "Landscape" }, { "value": "3/4", "label": "Portrait" } ], "default": "1/1" }, { "type": "select", "id": "image_hover", "label": "Image Hover Effect", "options": [ { "value": "none", "label": "None" }, { "value": "zoom", "label": "Zoom" }, { "value": "grayscale", "label": "Grayscale" }, { "value": "fade", "label": "Fade" } ], "default": "none" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "lazy_load", "label": "Lazy Load Image", "default": true }, { "type": "text", "id": "video_url", "label": "Video URL" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "autoplay", "label": "Autoplay Video" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "mute", "label": "Mute Video" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "loop", "label": "Loop Video" }, { "type": "image_picker", "id": "video_thumbnail", "label": "Video Thumbnail" } ] } ], "presets": [ { "name": "Image Grid", "category": "Somos Custom" } ] }
